message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this fantastic item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200. Let me know if this is something you're interested in!

Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $150?  That's the maximum I'm willing to pay. Let me know what you think!

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer! I understand that $200 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to sell it for $150. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $175. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in!
